extension.description: @realvito[CR]Musik aus verschiedenen Quellen z.B. Billboard, iTunes, Spotify etc. auswählen und über Youtube abspielen.[CR][CR]Für mehr Informationen zu allen Neuerungen siehe - CHANGELOG.[CR] TEST IT AND LIKE IT

@realvito[CR]Choose Music from different sources e.g. Billboard, iTunes, Spotify etc. and play it via Youtube.[CR][CR]For more information about all new features see - CHANGELOG.[CR] TEST IT AND LIKE IT
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 2, June 1991
extension.news:
[B]Version 2.0.3 (04.03.2017)[/B] by realvito - fixed: Beatport not showing Genres - fixed: Billboard-Archive-Videos take a long time to load - fixed: Showing duplicate Title-Entrys in Billboard-Archive-Videos / if Title and Artist have the same Entry, they are not shown since now - removed: Weblink "k-pop-hot-100" in Billboard-Genres (because of no results) + added: Entry "tropical" and "soundtracks" - fixed: Showing duplicate Title-Entrys in iTunes-Videos - fixed: Spotify-Playlist-Images - added: Spotify-Search for: Artists, Songs, Albums + Settings for: Spotify-Search (many Users require it)
- [B][COLOR red]comment: If the Spotify-Search does not show as much results as was selected in the settings, then duplicate entries were filtered out !!![/COLOR][/B]
- added: Videos without "Audio" or "audio" in the YOUTUBE-description are preferred for playback - fixed: Notification (VideoOSD) for TitleInfo does not automatically close on some Systems - fixed: Cache-Links for Youtube queries shortened because of problems with character limit > 255 on some Windows operating systems - Many other light Changes

addon.name: TV Spielfilm - Das Beste aus den Mediatheken

extension.description: @realvito[CR]Das Beste aus deutschen Mediatheken, ausgewählt und zusammengestellt von der Zeitschrift TV-Spielfilm (www.tvspielfilm.de).[CR][CR]Für mehr Informationen zu allen Neuerungen siehe - CHANGELOG.[CR] HAVE FUN
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 2, June 1991
extension.news: [B]Version 1.0.4 (26.02.2017)[/B] - fixed: ZDF-VideoLink verlangt neuerdings ein zweites Mal den API-Schlüssel für eine URL

extension.description: @realvito[CR]Das Beste aus deutschen Mediatheken, ausgewählt und zusammengestellt von der Zeitschrift TV-Today (www.tvtoday.de).[CR][CR]Für mehr Informationen zu allen Neuerungen siehe - CHANGELOG.[CR] HAVE FUN
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 2, June 1991
extension.news: [B]Version 1.3.4 (26.02.2017)[/B] - fixed: ZDF-VideoLink verlangt neuerdings ein zweites Mal den API-Schlüssel für eine URL

extension.description: Download And Install Addons Developed By Collabsvito.[CR]These Addons Should Not Missed.
